jflowmap.util

Class EventListenerList<L>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<L>
          • jflowmap.util.EventListenerList<L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<L>, java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler, java.util.Collection<L>, java.util.List<L>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class EventListenerList<L>
extends java.util.ArrayList<L>
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Example usage: 
     EventListenerList list =
   new EventListenerList(PropertyChangeListener.class);

 list.addListener(new PropertyChangeListener() {
  public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt) {
  }
 });

 list.fire().propertyChange(new PropertyChangeEvent("bebe", "name", null, null));
    See also http://skavish.livejournal.com/189435.html
    Author:
    Dmitry Skavish
